core.name: Combo ATK: Good and Evil, Evidence in the Heart
core.description:
[Conviction] During this period, when a teammate with Lightning DMG tag on the field deals DMG, Aponia additionally deals 135% ATK of Lightning DMG. It can be triggered once every 0.4s.

[Purgation] When the Purgation meter is full, hold ATK to enter [Foreseer's Punishment] state, reduced Total DMG taken by Aponia by 80%, deals 16 x 125% ATK of Lightning DMG. When [Purgation] count is reset to zero, Aponia will release [Restrictor's Judgment] to all enemies in the field, deals 1850% ATK of Lightning DMG, and remove [Foreseer's Punishment] state.

subskills.name: Do Not Disgrace
subskills.description: Total DMG of Combo ATK +15.0%, During [Conviction] every Combo ATK restores 10.0 [Purgation] count

subskills.name: Do Not Indulge
subskills.description: Lightning DMG of Combo ATK +15.0%. During [Conviction], every Combo ATK hit restores 0.20 SP.

subskills.name: Do Not Extort
subskills.description: [Restrictor's Judgment] deals 300.0 ATK of bonus Lightning DMG and restores 5.0 SP.

core.name: This Sentience, Forbidden From Having Worldly Thoughts
core.description:
[Purgation] count can be gain by various skills during battle(max at 200).
When 3rd SEQ and 4th SEQ of Basic ATKs hit the target, it restores 10/25 [Purgation] count.
When the character equiped Chakram, Aponia will use it as a magic ring and obtain [This Sentience, Forbidden From Having Worldly Thoughts].
While [Purgation] is not full, using Weapon Skill makes Aponia enters [Conviction] state.
During [Conviction], [Purgation] count restores 5 points per second, max at 200, the character becomes invincible and unable to move or evade. During this time, you can switch to other characters to enter the field. Aponia will remain on the field until fully charged.
When [Purgation] count reaches 200, [Conviction] state ends, leaving the fields and resets switch CD of herself.

subskills.name: Follow Me, Redeem
subskills.description: When entering [Foreseer's Punishment], Total DMG +30.0% for 9.0s.

subskills.name: Follow Me, Awaken
subskills.description: Lightning DMG of [Restrictor's Judgment] +45.0%. When leaving [Foreseer's Punishment], restores 15.0 SP

subskills.name: Follow Me, Eclose
subskills.description: When triggering Ultimate Evasion, Light DMG taken by enemies +20.0% for 12.0s(independent effect).

core.name: This Sin, Lasts Forever
core.description:
Disciplinary Perdition drops devastating blows and deals 14 x 180% + 1280% ATK of Lightning DMG. During this period, all timers stop.

SP: 100, CD: 20s

subskills.name: The Sin, Prevading and Unforgivable

subskills.name: The Sin, Must Be Excommunicated

core.name: This Body, Surrendering To Every Karma
core.description:
Quickly evades enemy attack. Can be performed twice in a row.
Ultimate Evasion: Inflicts 2.5s of global Time Fracutre, unleash [Invoker's Promise] against all enemies in the field, dealing 3 x 300% ATK of Lightning DMG and restoring 300 HP of the whole team. CD: 15s.

subskills.description: When an enemy paralyzes, restores 40.0 [Purgation] count and triggers Ultimate Evasion(Other Valkyrie on the field can also take effect). Lightning DMG of [Invoker's Promise] +50.0%.

subskills.name: Witnessed Suffering Dissipated
subskills.description: Entering [Conviction] or [Foreseer's Punishment] state, triggers Ultimate Evasion Skill.

core.name: Love Grows, Clearly Unbounded
core.description:
1st SEQ: 3 x 65% ATK of Lightning DMG.
2nd SEQ: 6 x 25% ATK of Lightning DMG.
3rd SEQ: 65% + 80% ATK of Lightning DMG.
4th SEQ: 250% ATK of Lightning DMG.
During [Conviction], hold ATK button to drops lightning against an enemy, to deal 100% ATK of Lightning DMG. This damage is regarded as a Combo ATK, which can be triggered once every 0.35s.

subskills.name: To This Atonment For Evil Deed

subskills.name: QTE: To This Suffering From Evil Intention
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when enemy is time-slowed or paralyzed, induces 3s of global Time Fracture, deals 3 x 100% + 4 x 150% + 900.0% ATK of Lightning DMG to all enemies in the field, and restores 6.0 SP.
